name: Directive
text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot fight more than twice each round. [fast] During a skill test while investigating, evading, or parleying, exhaust Directive: You get +2 skill value for this test for each enemy engaged with you.
real_text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot fight more than twice each round. [fast] During a skill test while investigating, evading, or parleying, exhaust Directive: You get +2 skill value for this test for each enemy engaged with you.

name: Directive
text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot play more than 2 cards each round. [reaction] When you play an [[Insight]] or [[Tactic]] event, exhaust this Directive: That event gains fast.
real_text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot play more than 2 cards each round. [reaction] When you play an [[Insight]] or [[Tactic]] event, exhaust this Directive: That event gains fast.

name: Directive
text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot voluntarily assign damage or horror to [[Ally]] assets. You have 1 additional ally slot.
real_text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot voluntarily assign damage or horror to [[Ally]] assets. You have 1 additional ally slot.

name: Directive
text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - When your location has 1 or more clues, you cannot commit cards to skill tests unless you have discovered a clue this round. [reaction] After you discover a clue, if an enemy is at your location, exhaust this Directive: Draw 1 card.
real_text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - When your location has 1 or more clues, you cannot commit cards to skill tests unless you have discovered a clue this round. [reaction] After you discover a clue, if an enemy is at your location, exhaust this Directive: Draw 1 card.

name: Directive
text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot move more than twice each round. You get +3 sanity.
real_text: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot move more than twice each round. You get +3 sanity.

name: Roland's .38 Special
text: Roland Banks deck only. Advanced. Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack (if there are 1 or more clues on your location, you get +4 [combat], instead). This attack deals +1 damage. If this attack defeats an enemy and there are no clues on your location, place 1 ammo on Roland's .38 Special
real_text: Roland Banks deck only. Advanced. Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack (if there are 1 or more clues on your location, you get +4 [combat], instead). This attack deals +1 damage. If this attack defeats an enemy and there are no clues on your location, place 1 ammo on Roland's .38 Special

name: Cover Up
text: Advanced. Revelation - Put Cover Up into play in your threat area, with 4 clues on it. [reaction] When you would discover 1 or more clues at your location: Discard that many clues from Cover Up instead. Forced - When the game ends, if there are any clues on Cover Up: You suffer 1 mental trauma.
real_text: Advanced. Revelation - Put Cover Up into play in your threat area, with 4 clues on it. [reaction] When you would discover 1 or more clues at your location: Discard that many clues from Cover Up instead. Forced - When the game ends, if there are any clues on Cover Up: You suffer 1 mental trauma.

name: By the Book
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the number of [[Cultist]] enemies in the victory display, to a maximum of 5.
[cultist]: -2. If a [[Cultist]] enemy is engaged with you, reveal an additional chaos token.
[tablet]: -3. Ready each [[Cultist]] enemy engaged with you.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, Roland Banks takes 1 damage.
real_text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the number of [[Cultist]] enemies in the victory display, to a maximum of 5.
[cultist]: -2. If a [[Cultist]] enemy is engaged with you, reveal an additional chaos token.
[tablet]: -3. Ready each [[Cultist]] enemy engaged with you.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, Roland Banks takes 1 damage.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is 1 plus the number of [[Cultist]] enemies in the victory display.
[cultist]: -3. If a [[Cultist]] enemy is engaged with you, reveal an additional chaos token.
[tablet]: -4. Ready each [[Cultist]] enemy engaged with you.
[elder_thing]: -5. If you fail, Roland Banks takes 1 damage.

name: A Covert Conspiracy
text: Forced - When a non-weakness [[Cultist]] enemy would be defeated: Heal damage from that enemy until it has 1 remaining health, instead. Forced - If Roland Banks is defeated: Proceed to (→R2) [action]: Resign. You don't want to miss your deadline, so you close the case.
real_text: Forced - When a non-weakness [[Cultist]] enemy would be defeated: Heal damage from that enemy until it has 1 remaining health, instead. Forced - If Roland Banks is defeated: Proceed to (→R2) [action]: Resign. You don't want to miss your deadline, so you close the case.
flavor: Mr. Grey is a powerful man with a lot of friends. Getting him behind bars is going to be tricky.

linked_card.name: Mr. Grey
linked_card.text:
Spawn - Engaged with Roland Banks.

Hunter. Mr. Grey gets +2 health.

Forced - After Mr. Grey attacks an investigator: That investigator draws the top card of the encounter deck.
linked_card.real_text: Spawn - Engaged with Roland Banks. Hunter. Mr. Grey gets +2 [per_investigator] health. Forced - After Mr. Grey attacks an investigator: That investigator draws the top card of the encounter deck.
linked_card.flavor: "Take comfort in the idea that your death serves a much greater purpose."

name: Your Deadline Nears
text: Forced - When a non-weakness [[Cultist]] enemy would be defeated: Heal damage from that enemy until it has 1 remaining health, instead. Forced - If Roland Banks is defeated: Proceed to (→R2) [action]: Resign. You don't want to miss your deadline, so you close the case.
real_text: Forced - When a non-weakness [[Cultist]] enemy would be defeated: Heal damage from that enemy until it has 1 remaining health, instead. Forced - If Roland Banks is defeated: Proceed to (→R2) [action]: Resign. You don't want to miss your deadline, so you close the case.
flavor: Your superiors are pressuring you to drop your investigation. Mr. Grey's influence, no doubt. Meanwhile, he and his lackies are doing everything in their power to quietly remove you from the equation, once and for all.
back_text: Remove a [[Cultist]] enemy in the victory display from the game (Mr. Grey, if able). (→R1).
back_flavor:
"It's not enough," your superior scolds you. "I'm sorry, but it's just too contrived for me to believe. And if I don't believe it, the courts won't, either. I mean, honestly. Cults? Human sacrifices?"
You grit your teeth and slam your hand down on the myriad documents and evidence you've collected. It's all there, you insist.
"It's been weeks and you don't have a real case here. Just a lot of circumstantial mumbo-jumbo," he deflects. "And besides, Mr. Grey is a cornerstone of this community. That you would disparage him with these accusations..." The hint of derision towards you in his voice gives him away. Is he on Grey's payroll? Or worse? Either way, it's clear arguing won't get you anywhere. You know better than to make a fuss. You'll have to keep your head down and do things your own way if you want to make a difference in Arkham.

name: Capture the Conspirators
text: [fast] The investigators spend 1 [per_investigators] clues, as a group: Flip over a facedown conspirator at your location and put it into play engaged with you. [fast] Spend 1 resource: Exhaust a [[Cultist]] enemy engaged with you (it remains engaged). Only Roland Banks may trigger this ability.] Objective - Parley with as many conspirators as you can. If 10 [[Cultist]] enemies are in the victory display, advance.
real_text: [fast] The investigators spend 1 [per_investigators] clues, as a group: Flip over a facedown conspirator at your location and put it into play engaged with you. [fast] Spend 1 resource: Exhaust a [[Cultist]] enemy engaged with you (it remains engaged). Only Roland Banks may trigger this ability.] Objective - Parley with as many conspirators as you can. If 10 [[Cultist]] enemies are in the victory display, advance.
flavor: Taking down the culprits behind the sacrifices can only be done with proof, in a court of law. You'll have to do this fair and square.
back_flavor:
Mr. Grey paces the length of his cell, glaring at you from behind the bars. "You're going to regret this, Agent Banks," he snarls. "You'll be begging for my mercy when this is over."
You politely remind Mr. Grey that threatening a federal agent is a felony.
"There are worse things to be afraid of than the likes of you," he replies, before slumping into the corner of his cell, defeated.
The true culprit is behind bars, but you still don't know what his real purpose was in aiding the conspirators behind the murders. What could possibly compel one to take the lives of so many? You don't know - but you intend to find out.

name: Arkham Police Station
text: Arkham Police Station is connected to Rivertown, Downtown, and Easttown, and vice versa. [fast]: Move to a connecting location. [fast] Choose a non-weakness [[Cultist]] enemy at this location and spend clues equal to its remaining health: Parley. Add that enemy to the victory display.
real_text: Arkham Police Station is connected to Rivertown, Downtown, and Easttown, and vice versa. [fast]: Move to a connecting location. [fast] Choose a non-weakness [[Cultist]] enemy at this location and spend clues equal to its remaining health: Parley. Add that enemy to the victory display.
back_text: Arkham Police Station is connected to Rivertown, Downtown, and Easttown, and vice versa.
back_flavor: With Sheriff Engel and the rest of the officers dismissive of your suspicions, you set off to investigate the murders yourself.
